item.title: Docs: Installing gRPC Traffic Controller
item.description:
Prerequisites

  • Kubernetes 1.21+ (requires endpoint slices).
  • Helm 3

Installation

gRPC traffic controller has no release yet so we can’t properly document this, let’s fix this in a near future
